snippet.title: Fallen Legion Revenants - Announcement Trailer (PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™)
snippet.description:
Learn more at https://fallenlegiongame.com/revenants

Your choices will decide the fates of many in Fallen Legion Revenants! The world is covered in miasma, and the remnants of mankind have taken refuge in a floating castle ruled by a madman. Swap between manipulating events within Welkin Castle as the cunning Lucien and fighting off monsters in the wasteland below as the vengeful Rowena in this real-time action RPG.

Coming 2021.

#FallenLegionRevenants #NewGamePlusExpo
